question.answer: Male (if anyone else wrote "yes, please", I'll kill them)
Short and long... I cut it myself
I heard there was free food

I like to play Jazz. Sadly, I cannot provide vivid descriptions as I haven't touched an instrument in almost a month now and am forgetting what my trombone looks like. I'm also into travelling a lot. I divert my student loan funds to travel, by cleverly buying and returning my books each week.
My favorite song is Miles Davis' "Someday My Prince Will Come", because someday... my prince will come. It is 9 minutes long and 8 megabytes.
I would ideally like to live to be around 60 or 65. I figure my body will probably run out of juice by then and I don't want to spend my days in a rocking chair

Stress balls. Judging by the name, you would think that they relieve stress, but instead they add it, because you can never seem to crush the damn things! Lesser beings would likely squeeze them until they themselves would implode
